value.title: Tesla unveils its latest humanoid robot, Optimus Gen 2, in demo video
value.excerpt: On Tuesday, Tesla released a demo video showing the latest version of its prototype humanoid robot, Optimus Gen 2. Over one year after Tesla's first public Optimus robot demonstration, which showcased shaky robots that waved and slumped over, things have apparently progressed quite a bit, assuming that the video accurately reflects the technology.

value.title: Virginia sheriff says Tesla Autopilot was running before driving under tractor-trailer
value.excerpt: Virginia authorities have determined that a Tesla was operating on its Autopilot system and was speeding in the moments leading to a crash with a crossing tractor-trailer last July that killed the Tesla driver.

value.title: Guideline unveiled to make public use of autonomous driving vehicles safer
value.excerpt: The guideline, issued on Tuesday by the Ministry of Transport, applies to autonomous vehicles for both passenger and freight transportation services such as taxis, buses and trucks. It covers vehicles with various degrees of automation and mandates that they carry at least one driver or security inspector.

value.title: Half of university students are scared their jobs will be under threat from AI
value.excerpt: Half of current students at university think their current and future jobs could be under threat from artificial intelligence (AI). New research from Kingston University looked at whether students are equipped for their futures in a rapidly changing workplace, particularly where technology is concerned.
